name: AtorvastatinAndAmlodipineCombination
title: Atorvastatin and Amlodipine Combination
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains the use of both generic and brand name Atorvastatin and Amlodipine Combinations.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who use generic or brand name Atorvastatin and Amlodipine Combinations. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the "Medication" category, with Datatype: "Medication, Active".),(Inclusion Criteria: Active usage of both generic and brand name Atorvastatin and Amlodipine Combinations.),(Exclusion Criteria: There is no exclusion criteria listed for this value set.)
